short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: After added to Google Chrome, when watching YouTube clips if an ad pops up MutAd will mute the volume and will skip the ad onceâ€¦

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: After added to Google Chrome, when watching YouTube clips if an ad pops up MutAd will mute the volume and will skip the ad once possible. If mute was on before the ad it will remain in this status.
